full_summary:
**Boreal Trail Re-Design – Riding Mountain National Park**
====================================================================

**Solicitation Number:** 5P468-22-0245/A

**Publication Date:** January 20, 2023

**Closing Date:** February 28, 2023, at 4:00 PM EST

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**
-------------------------------

The Parks Canada Agency (PCA) is inviting consulting firms to submit proposals for the provision of professional design services and prime consultant services for the Boreal Trail Re-Design – Riding Mountain National Park.

**Project Description**
------------------------

The project involves designing an accessible trail, replacing an existing boardwalk section and viewing platform, and designing two pedestrian bridges. The scope of work includes providing professional design services and prime consultant services.

**Bidders’ Conference**
----------------------

A bidders’ conference will be held via teleconference on February 8, 2023, at 11:00 AM CST. The conference will review the project’s scope of work and answer questions. Participation is recommended for bidders.

**Evaluation Criteria**
-----------------------

The proposal will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* 60% Evaluation of technical merits
* 40% Evaluation of price

**Additional Information**
---------------------------

* The National Parks Regulations require that all work be performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act.
* Bidders should obtain documents from the Government Electronic Tendering Service through the Government of Canada tendering service.
* Addenda, when issued, will be available on the Government of Canada tendering service website.
* Late submissions will not be considered.

**Submission**
--------------

Proposals will be accepted via email or fax. The following information must be included in the submission:

* A completed proposal brief
* A technical proposal
* A price proposal
* Any additional attachments as necessary

Please note that proposals submitted via SAP Ariba will not be accepted.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For any further information or clarification, please contact Jennifer Maheu, at jennifer.maheu@pc.gc.ca or 587-432-8458.

**Attachments**
---------------

The tenders can be downloaded from the Government Electronic Tendering Service through the Government of Canada tendering service at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.

Note, their are still some minor editing tweaks in the text that you could do improve the clarity and ensure the text lines up properly with the markdown
